text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It seems as if it was only a short<n>moment ago that I walked
through<n>those Tracen Academy gates for the<n>first time, yet
today marks yet another<n>beginning!

text_block_list.name: Chief Trainer
text_block_list.text:
How do you do, <username>? I am the<n>chief trainer of the
team you will be<n>joining from this moment on.

text_block_list.name: Chief Trainer
text_block_list.text:
I'm not sure how much pep I've got<n>left to keep up with all
these ambitious<n>runners at this age... I do hope that<n>I'm
able to impart all the insight an<n>up-and-coming assistant
trainer could<n>need.

text_block_list.name: Chief Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Hehe, now that's the spirit! I'm<n>expecting great things from
you. I've<n>actually been keeping an eye on all<n>your efforts.
You're here for a very<n>good reason!

text_block_list.name: Chief Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Enough chatter, though. I want you to<n>meet a real go-getter.
Let's go<n>outside.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
New trainers are placed under the<n>guidance of a veteran.
The idea is to<n>help out and gain experience as a<n>team
assistant trainer for a certain<n>period of time.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
This team's trainer has been at it for<n>years and is quite
renowned. The time<n>has come for me to meet her newest<n>
trainee.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Huff... huff... I've finished withthe regimen you passed me thismorning, Trainer. What should I donext?

text_block_list.name: Chief Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Well done out there, Bell. I had some<n>partner running
planned for you next,<n>but before that, would you mind? This<n>
is our new assistant trainer we spoke<n>of the other day.

text_block_list.name: Chief Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Well done out there, Bell. I had some<n>partner running
planned for you next,<n>but before that, would you mind? This<n>
is our new assistant trainer we spoke<n>of the other day.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: ...Good day.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Oh, yes... Um... A pleasure to meet<n>you.

text_block_list.name: Chief Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Allow me to formally introduce you,<n>Assistant Trainer. This
is Bell—Mejiro<n>Dober. She is our team's precious<n>star.

text_block_list.name: Chief Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Allow me to formally introduce you,<n>Assistant Trainer. This
is Bell—Mejiro<n>Dober. She is our team's precious<n>star.

text_block_list.name: Chief Trainer
text_block_list.text:
I can only imagine that she will be the<n>final runner under my
own guidance.<n>I've become quite the old lady,<n>haven't I?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Trainer...

text_block_list.name: Chief Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Oh, just listen to me prattle on. Don't<n>worry about a thing,
Bell. I don't plan<n>on going anywhere just yet, so let's<n>
bring a smile back, okay?

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Pardon me. I'm here for some partner<n>running. Are you all
ready?

text_block_list.name: Chief Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Oh, yes! Thank you for taking the<n>time, Air Groove. Are you
prepared to<n>start. Bell?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Yes! I'm ready whenever you are.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Mejiro Dober and Air Groove take<n>off down the track as a
pair.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Air Groove is quite the respectable<n>training partner. Known
as the<n>"Empress," she's followed in her<n>mother's
footsteps, having taken<n>home the second Oaks win for her<n>
family.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Mejiro Dober has not made her<n>debut yet, but is seemingly
having little<n>problem keeping up.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Huff... huff... huff... Haaaaah!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Heh, not bad!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The runner displays an important sign<n>of a champion in the
making—an<n>energetic form that begets great<n>speeds. But
that's not all...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Keep going, keep goooing! Aaaaah!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Without even considering giving up,<n>she advances ever
forward. I'm very<n>impressed with her show of<n>willpower
and competitive spirit.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Huff... huff... huff... Thank you...very much!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Don't mention it. I must say,<n>Dober—that was quite the
showing.<n>Very impressive speed.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
But even so... I've still much room to<n>improve my
positioning and timing. I<n>wasn't able to overtake you even<n>
once...

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Haha, well, I don't yield my lead quite<n>so readily. Still, I could
definitely feel<n>your presence creeping ever closer.<n>You're
certainly paired with an<n>excellent trainer.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: That's right!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
I'm still so very weak, but I have<n>noticed at least a bit of
improvement. I<n>owe all of that to my trainer.

text_block_list.name: Chief Trainer
text_block_list.text: Good, good! That was a wonderful<n>run.

text_block_list.name: Chief Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Oh, what's this? Is that a twinkle in<n>your eyes that I see? I
just knew that<n>you would be one to understand.

text_block_list.name: Chief Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Isn't Bell just amazing? She's<n>practically overflowing with
talent.

text_block_list.name: Chief Trainer
text_block_list.text:
I do hope I can stand by her and help<n>her realize all of her
wildest dreams,<n>but I'm not sure I—

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
Um, Trainer? I still have some energy,<n>so would it be okay if
I accompanied<n>Air Groove for some extra training?

text_block_list.name: Chief Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Well now, it looks like someone is<n>feeling extra motivated
recently! I<n>don't see why not, if it's just one<n>more lap or
so. Take it a bit slower, all<n>right?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: I will. Thank you very much!

text_block_list.name: Chief Trainer
text_block_list.text: As for us, why don't we start<n>cleaning up?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I spend a bit more time helping out the<n>chief trainer, thinking
the whole while<n>about how lucky I was to be able to<n>
witness such fine running from<n>Mejiro Dober.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Hm? Wait, Dober.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: What is— Ah.

text_block_list.name: Reporters
text_block_list.text: Ryan! Ryan! Please look over here,<n>Mejiro Ryan!

text_block_list.name: Reporter Otonashi
text_block_list.text:
Mejiro Ryan, you had another terrific<n>race the other day!
What do you have<n>to say to all your fans who are<n>looking
forward to your next race?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
Umm... I'm so thankful for all your<n>support! I'll keep training
hard to<n>make sure I live up to all your<n>expectations!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: We'll go back this way. Let's go,<n>Dober.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: All right...
